title: SURF AND ENJOY TOUR 2014
description:
Learn to surf with the Hurley team on this summer's "Surf And Enjoy" tour, complete with surfing, beach games, raffles, and prizes. Leave your board at home and ride ours — no matter your approach or skill level we've got you covered. 

Thank you to our sponsors: FlexFit, Honda, Dragon, Futures, Waterman's Sunscreen, Rev'd, Oberto, Bubble Gum Surf Wax, Suja, INT, and Peace Ice Tea.
